desc_general_dk: (også kaldet incidens) viser personer, som blev nyligt diagnosticeret med REPLACE_OUTCOME hvert år. I HjerteTal betyder et nyt sygdomstilfælde, at personen aldrig har fået diagnosen før. OBS: Personer, der blev født i udlandet (inklusiv danske statsborgere) eller før 1977, er ekskluderet fra denne analyse.
desc_count_dk: viser antallet af nye tilfælde af REPLACE_OUTCOME i hvert år.  Det bruges til at vurder den absolutte sygdomsforekomst af REPLACE_OUTCOME. Det kan ikke bruges som et udtryk for den gennemsnitlige risiko for at udvikle sygdommen, fordi det ikke tager højde for forskellene i antallet af personer 'under risiko'.
desc_stratified_dk: viser antallet af nye tilfælde af REPLACE_OUTCOME per 100.000 personer i REPLACE_YEAR for hver REPLACE_AGGR. Raterne kan bruges som et udtryk for den gennemsnitlige risiko for at udvikle sygdommen for første gang blandt personer i en given REPLACE_AGGR i REPLACE_YEAR.
desc_standardized_dk: viser antallet af nye tilfælde af REPLACE_OUTCOME per 100.000 personer i REPLACE_YEAR for hver REPLACE_AGGR. Raterne kan bruges som et udtryk for den gennemsnitlige risiko for at udvikle sygdommen for første gang blandt personer i en given REPLACE_AGGR i REPLACE_YEAR.
desc_general_en: shows people who were newly diagnosed with REPLACE_OUTCOME for each year. In HjerteTal, an incident CHD means that person has never been diagnosed with a CHD before. Note: People born outside of Denmark (include Danish citizens), or those born before 1977, are excluded fort his analysis.
desc_count_en: shows the number of people who were diagnosed with REPLACE_OUTCOME for the first time during each year.  It should not be used to compare the incidence between years, because it does not take into account the differences in the number of people at-risk each year
desc_stratified_en: shows the rate of new cases of REPLACE_OUTCOME in REPLACE_YEAR for each REPLACE_AGGR. It could be considered the average risk of being diagnosed with REPLACE_OUTCOME for the first time for someone in each REPLACE_AGGR.
desc_standardized_en: allows a comparison of the rate of new cases of REPLACE_OUTCOME between REPLACE_AGGRr. It could be considered the average risk of being diagnosed with REPLACE_OUTCOME for the first time for someone in each REPLACE_AGGR.

desc_general_dk: viser personer, som lever med REPLACE_OUTCOME pr. 1. januar hvert år.
desc_count_dk: viser antallet af personer, som lever med REPLACE_OUTCOME i hvert år. Det bruges til at vurder den absolutte prævalens af REPLACE_OUTCOME.  Det kan ikke bruges som et udtryk for den gennemsnitlige sandsynlighed for at leve med sygdommen, fordi det ikke tager højde for forskellene i antallet af personer 'under risiko'
desc_stratified_dk: viser antallet af personer, som lever med REPLACE_OUTCOME per 100.000 personer i REPLACE_YEAR. Raten kan bruges som et udtryk for den gennemsnitlige sandsynlighed for at leve med sygdommen i en given REPLACE_AGGR i REPLACE_YEAR.
desc_standardized_dk: viser antallet af personer, som lever med REPLACE_OUTCOME per 100.000 personer i REPLACE_YEAR. Raten kan bruges som et udtryk for den gennemsnitlige sandsynlighed for at leve med sygdommen i en given REPLACE_AGGR i REPLACE_YEAR.
desc_general_en: shows people who are living with REPLACE_OUTCOME as of 1st January for each year. This includes anyone who has been diagnosed with REAPLCE_OUTCOME between 1977 and the given year, who is alive and are residents of Denmark as of 1st January.
desc_count_en: shows the number of people living with REPLACE_OUTCOME in each year. It should not be used to compare the prevalence between years, because it does not take into account the differences in the number of people at-risk in the different years
desc_stratified_en: shows the prevalence rate of REPLACE_OUTCOME in REPLACE_YEAR. It can be used to compare the prevalence of REPLACE_OUTCOME between different REPLACE_AGGRr.
desc_standardized_en: allows a comparison of the rate of people living with  REPLACE_OUTCOME in REPLACE_YEAR between REPLACE_AGGR

desc_general_dk: viser personer, som er blev diagnosticeret med REPLACE_OUTCOME, som også har gennemengået en hjerteoperation i det givent år. En person som har gennemgået en operation flere gange, tælles kun én gang.
desc_count_dk: viser antallet af personer, som har varet diagnosticeret med REPLACE_OUTCOME, som også fik foretaget en hjerteoperation i hvert år. En person som har gennemgået en operation flere gange, talles kun én gang.
desc_general_en: Shows people who have previously been diagnosed with REPLACE_OUTCOME, who have also undergone a related heart-operation during each year. A person who has multiple operations within the year will only be counted one time.
desc_count_en: Shows the number of people who have previously been diagnosed with REPLACE_OUTCOME, who have also undergone a related heart-operation during each year. A person who has multiple operations within the year will only be counted one time.

desc_general_dk: viser operationer hvert år blandt dem, som har været diagnosticeret med REPLACE_OUTCOME. En person som har gennemgået en operation flere gange, tælles flere gange.
desc_count_dk: viser antallet af operationer i hvert år blandt dem, som har varet diagnosticeret med REPLACE_OUTCOME. En person som har gennemgået en operation flere gange, talles flere gange.
desc_general_en: Shows congenital heart disease related operations in each year, among those who have previously been diagnosied with REPLACE_OUTCOME. A person who has multiple operations within the year will be counted multiple times.
desc_count_en: Shows the number congenital heart disease related operations in each year, among those who have previously been diagnosied with REPLACE_OUTCOME. A person who has multiple operations within the year will be counted multiple times.
